name: esercitazione-mariadb
postStartCommand: sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /workspace && sudo service mariadb start && sudo mariadb -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS mydatabase; CREATE USER IF NOT EXISTS 'vscode'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY ''; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON mydatabase.* TO 'vscode'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES;" && python3 .devcontainer/main.py
